text: My favorite place to buy kopi. the sellers are all very nice, and the kopi is strong and sweet. They also have snacks like kari pap
Had teh masala halia on 26/5/24, was quite good.

The best drink stall in the neighbourhood. I normally order kopiccino from them - a special drink with kopi base and pulled milk foam. It's very interesting to see how the barista pulled the milk to make foam for this drink - I can tell that he's extremely proud of his skill too. You can also request the sugar level and he will accommodate your request - pretty good service for a neighbourhood drink stall.

They are the only drink stall with sugarcane juice in the cluster - very fresh and great taste sugarcane, squeezed on request. They also have a big menu with interesting items to try. Highly recommended.

Here serves one of the best teh halia in Singapore and some said JB. There’s always a queue at the stall and the only time I find no queue is when the stall is closed. It closes early on Friday as the boss needs to go for Friday prayers.
One of the best teh halia i’ve had in the east side. They used fresh ginger.
